pages.title: AMI Wiki In-Game!
pages.text: The biggest new feature for AMI!

Removed FLY_FEAR $(br) Removed MANTIS_SPEED $(br) Removed TUSKLING_EQUIPMENT $(br) Removed SKITTISH_ROACHES $(br) Removed STUPID_CATFISH_EAT $(br) Massive Optimization $(br) Removes alexsmobsinteraction:long_gusting_potion $(br) Fixed Infect Immunity Bug $(br) Changed smallcritters to insects
pages.title: Changes

pages.text: Decreases gusting particle generation $(br) makes it so only players can spawn gusts with Gusting $(br) Decreases lifespan of gusts with Gusting $(br) Makes skreeching only work for players $(br) Reduces health requirement for anaconda eating weak anacondas from 20% to 10% $(br) Removed CAPUCHIN_KILL tag
pages.title: Changes

pages.text: Makes raccoon only hunt at night $(br) Made snapping turtles also be awake while thundering $(br) Made Snapping turtle moss accumulation work for thundering $(br) Added Weakness effect with Sun Bird upgrade feature $(br) Removed Glowing effect with Sun bird upgrade feature $(br) Changed tigers blessing invisibility to work for walking
pages.title: Changes

pages.text: You cannot shear tamed flutters $(br) Changed procedure with Transforming Crimson Mosquitoes to Warped Mosco $(br) Removed log spams $(br) Gusting now makes you immune to gusters lifting you $(br) Fixed Terrapin bug $(br) Changed Fly transform procedure $(br) Changed Rain Frog transform procedure $(br) Changed Mudskipper kill tag
pages.title: Changes

pages.text: Changed Crow weapon tag $(br) Changed Frog Conversion $(br) Gives slight speed with Gusting effect $(br) Added new Blooded Effect $(br) Fixed Rolling Thunder $(br) Changed Final Stand mechanics $(br) Reduced Effect duration for Gusting $(br) New Enchantment, Stretchy Accumulation $(br) Eagles dont cannibalize when they are tamed
pages.title: Changes

pages.text: Blobfish now runs from Frilled Shark $(br) Fixed Crow cannibalize $(br) Fixed Elephant territorial $(br) Fixed Emu Egg Attack $(br) Made Flies run only from lit candles $(br) Removed Bloodless Ignore $(br) Fixed Grizzly Bear attacking players even when tamed $(br) Added Trade for Fisherman with Devils Hole Pupfish
pages.title: Changes

pages.text: Adds ability to pour poison essence on mobs $(br) Eradicated Animal Dictionary Changes $(br) Compatible with new AM update $(br) Unstuns Void Worm when stunned and is below -50 Y
pages.title: Changes
